name: Nobody Sleeps Tonight
description:
Your friend disappears in the middle of the night during an isolated forest cabin trip. It's up to you to find them, although it appears the forest may be holding a dark, unexpected secret.

It's up to you to brave the secrets of the forest and rescue your friend, and get out while you both still can... or while you still can.

Features:
  • Large randomly generated environments ensuring each playthrough is fresh. A large randomly generated forest and underground tunnel network to explore.
  • Replayability due to random generations of each new playthrough. Randomized environment, placement of loot, items, points of interest, etc
  • Play alone or online with up to a total of four players
  • Multiplayer proximity voice chat and text chat
  • Survival elements - how long will you survive in a strange forest, or will you make it out?
  • Multiple endings - Find hidden lore and uncover the true sinister secrets beneath...
  • Explore the surface of the forest and the secretive caverns below it...
  • Global leaderboards for things such as fastest escape... can you and your friends set a record?

Nothing is at is seems, and your pleasant forest cabin trip will reveal a sinister secret the forest hides.
